author: Christopher Blair
comment: This is a decent app. Has a lot of choices for watch faces all of witch are editable. The only problems I have had has been with updates with android wear and this app updating causing the watch to stop working with both apps.  The developer is good enough to help as much as he can although sometimes you can get lost in the instructions.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Christopher - it is Android Wear bug with installation. Please check my FAQ: http://bit.ly/wearfaq or mail me at academyextreme@gmail.com - I can easily support you to fix this Android installation issue. Marcin from Studio eXtreme

author: Jennifer McGaffey
comment: I picked this face when I got my watch because it was, well, minimal and elegant. It showed what I needed (including some things I hadn't thought of needing, like battery levels), clearly and simply. The developer keeps adding even better functions - music control and now Tasker integration, among the highlights! Still simple and functional, and getting better all the time.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you so much Jennifer :-) This is so great to read such amazing reviews.

author: Brian Craigen
comment: Really neat watch app. It has presets, you can make changes to those, or you can make your own. It takes some patience to get used to but it is neat.

author: leonel rodriguez
comment: So many choices for preset faces, so many customizable options, and if your creative enough with a little time you can make your own. This app is "a one stop" for watch faces.

author: Navpritsingh Sangari
comment: Had initial issues but excellent support by developers helped resolve them. Working excellent on my fossil Q founder 2.0 now.. superb

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Please make sure to install the app on the Watch - this is the way Android Wear works. It's not enough to install app on the phone. Please mail me and I will help you - email: academyextreme@gmail.com

author: Brad Frese
comment: Not very intuitive or well organized

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Brad for your opinion. Initial impression after getting hundreds of detailed options may be really shocking, I know. You will really get the app idea really fast, learn from examples it's the best way - import any of thousands faces to see how it's done. All will be easy then :-)

author: Soumyasish Dutta
comment: The app is nice please add support for misfit vapor or pls suggest which option to select for Vapor.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hi. Misfit Vapor is indeed supported, the correct screen size to choose is: Other - standard resolution. In case of any other questions you can mail me directly: academyextreme@gmail.com . Thanks :-)

author: C Montague
comment: The best watch faces I've seen so far.  If you can't find a face then you're not looking.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you, doing my best to keep the app interesting :-)

author: Frederico Prado
comment: I checked several other apps before arriving to this one and this definetelly the best. The personalization is quite easy and really complete.

author: CJ LeDrow IV
comment: Don't waste time with any other costomization apps for watch faces. This will teach all!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you for amazing review CJ :-)

author: Dan Farmer
comment: Great tool for customizing watch faces and funcions.

author: Andy Robinson
comment: Can be used simply or advanced without tutorials needed, fun!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Andy, please make sure to check our communities :-)

author: Shubh Sharma
comment: Was able Explore next level  of watch face

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much. Doing my best to keep the app interesting :-)

author: Frederick LoManto
comment: What a great tool this designer has created for tweaking EVERY aspect in the design of a watch face!  GREAT JOB !!!
Biggest issue for me is which face to pick!! Pretty user friendly.

author: Jorge Arvelo
comment: App works great and watch faces are awesome. Definitely worth purchasing. :)

author: Terry Brown
comment: Great looking, highly customizable, and very battery friendly.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Terry. I do appreciate your great opinion.

author: Rox Pozz
comment: Ok one of the best

author: Arun S Gopalaswami
comment: Great app for customizing watch faces

author: King2013
comment: Really worth the cheap price. Get it.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much for the recommendation and good opinion :-)

author: Nirmal Singh
comment: Good watch faces design.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you :-)

author: rene bedgood
comment: Awesome app!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much Rene :-)

author: Mike Noel
comment: Great watch faces

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much Mike :-)

author: Tom Gojcaj
comment: Good work

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Tom :-)

author: Paul Birch
comment: Excellent thanks

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Paul :-)

author: ANCHOR
comment: Good

author: Mike M
comment: Nice concept but it is a little too cluttered and unintuitive for my taste. Tons of improvements could be easily implemented but I am not paid to give such suggestions. Best of luck to developer.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hello. Thanks for sharing your opinion. App constantly receives new updates so new goodies will appear for sure :-)

author: Arda A
comment: Using it on my Moto 360 1st gen. Works pretty stable and fast. Doesn't drain my charge, it's almost same without the app. I'd recommend it. Also, it is easier to make your own theme.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you for amazing review :-)

author: Snow Borne
comment: The watch faces are good and beautiful but I can't use it with Samsung S3 Frontier. Is there any option to get refund. Thanks

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Dear Snow Borne - please mail me at: academyextreme@gmail.com - The review aren't suitable for supper of any kind - I need the purchase details to issue the refund - if still possible. Thank you.

author: Zsolt Kaszas
comment: The weather information doesn't working and the phone battery is never up to date. Please allow to set the installed apps by users in Interactive function. - Otherwise it is a great  watchface and I keep it. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ UPDATE - This is a really old review, I wrote it 1 or 2 years ago and whenever I try to update it/delete it the stupid Google Play recovers it... Anyway, nice, feature rich app, happy with it! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
Zsolt - just Exclude Minimal from Battery Savings - all is in the FAQ: http://academyextreme.com/faq
Everything is already working and fixed :-) If you need personal assistance with your phone, just mail me (academyextreme@gmail.com)

author: Robert Van Overmeiren
comment: You can do everything with this watch face!  Will never use anything else.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you so much Robert :-) Such reviews gives motivation to work hard and add even more cool features to the app :-)

author: Kevin Sharpe
comment: Yep...awesome

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Kevin :-)

author: Kevin Mintus
comment: Bought the app. When working with a face, the app will bounce me out and I then can no longer find the app on my phone. It's not in the folder I put it in, or the app drawer. I checked Google Play and it still thinks I have it installed. I've tried reinstalling with the same result. Rebooting the phone does not make it appear either. I'll keep playing with it, but If I can't use it, I'll get a refund.  -- Update -- Developer assisted me in fixing this issue. Very quick and helpful in responding. Changing my rating from 3 to 5.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Kevin - you have hidden the icon, see my faq: http://bit.ly/wearfaq it is so easy to enable or disable this launcher icon. You can always access the app via Android Wear app on your phone. Just in case you can always mail me (academyextreme@gmail.com).

author: Kade Jansson
comment: Love the app! So many great customizations. One thing I really want, but can't figure out - Is there a way to add the day's high and low temperatures to the weather section?

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hi Jade. Thank you for great opinion about the app. The Hi&Low temp can be added but via Tasker for example, join our Community in case of more detailed questions :-) Thanks!

author: Peter Böhm
comment: This app really keeps its promises. I have tried many watch faces and watch face designers available for Android, but none comes close to this. Stable, feature rich, yet easy to use - even for someone like me with not too much technical background. Very good integration of AW 2 complications and notification handling. There is fast and professional support available, listening to requests. Well deserved 5 stars and worth every penny.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much Peter :-) doing my best to keep the app interesting :-) More updates will appear in the future for sure :-)

author: David Sewell
comment: Incredible watch face customizer. Not only can you download literally tons of premade faces, you can customize your own from the ground up and tweak so many different things that get updated to your watch face almost literally instantly. Absolutely love this app, I will be recommending it to everyone I know.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you so much David :-) I do really appreciate your great opinion :-)

author: Erich W
comment: Favorite wear app that is constantly updated by a developer who has a passion for what he does while listening to the users and is constantly creating new features as soon as they are announced like interactivity combined with unique features like little world's and magic backgrounds  makes this an app where you can have different designs and styles based on your own preferences and moods

author: David Wilkinson
comment: It takes time to figure it out and it's not very intuitive, but once you got it, it's really great. Unlimited watch faces, and favourites you can add on the phone and update on the watch later. I like it.

author: Romano DC
comment: The best just keeps getting better ....with frequent updates and new features added regularly. Customisation possibilities are endless, easy to use, battery friendly and the developer and community are very helpful too. It has a great community on G+. The app updates are extensively tested before each release, please don't leave a bad review in the very rare chance that you have a problem, just post your question in the Google+ community or contact the developer, everyone is very helpful and can normally resolve any issue very quickly.. Update..App now comes with free widget options for your home screen and for a very small fee you can unlock some additional customisations. Highly recommended and great value.👍

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
Tank you for the great review! 
The community is a really great place with many creators and presets! 
See you around.
Enjoy the app in 100% ! :-)

author: cameron feather
comment: Would like to properly use this app but won't find my watch, it's a Huawei v2 and connected to Android Wear but won't link with the app. If I can solve this I will review my rating

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Please mail me academyextreme@gmail.com - I think that you have missed the need of installation on the watch (via watch Play Store) Anyway - please mail me and I will guide you through :-)
